events.name: onChange
events.description: Handler that is called when the element's selection state changes. You can pull out the new checked state by accessing `event.target.checked` (boolean).
events.description_zh: 当元素的选择状态发生更改时调用的处理程序。您可以通过访问“event.target.checked”（布尔值）来提取新的选中状态。

events.name: onValueChange
events.description: Handler that is called when the element's selection state changes.
events.description_zh: 当元素的选择状态发生更改时调用的处理程序。

value.description: The value of the input element, used when submitting an HTML form.
value.description_zh: 提交HTML表单时使用的input元素的值。

name.description: The name of the input element, used when submitting an HTML form.
name.description_zh: 提交HTML表单时使用的输入元素的名称。

color.type: default / primary / secondary / success / warning / danger

:thumbIcon.description: The icon to be displayed when the switch is checked.
:thumbIcon.description_zh: 选中开关时显示的图标。

:startContent.description: The icon to be displayed at the start of the switch.
:startContent.description_zh: 要在交换机开始时显示的图标。

:endContent.description: The icon to be displayed at the end of the switch.
:endContent.description_zh: 要在交换机末尾显示的图标。

isSelected.description: Whether the element should be selected (controlled).

defaultSelected.description: Whether the element should be selected (uncontrolled).
defaultSelected.description_zh: 是否应选择元素（不受控制）。

isRequired.description: Whether user input is required on the input before form submission.
isRequired.description_zh: 在提交表单之前，是否需要用户对输入进行输入。

isReadOnly.description: Whether the input can be selected but not changed by the user.
isReadOnly.description_zh: 输入是否可以由用户选择但不能更改。

disableAnimation.description: Whether the animation should be disabled.

classNames.description: Allows to set custom class names for the switch slots.
classNames.description_zh: 允许为交换机插槽设置自定义类名。

slots.name: base
slots.description: Base slot for the switch. It is the main wrapper.
slots.description_zh: 交换机的基本插槽。它是主要的包装器。

slots.name: wrapper
slots.description: The wrapper of the start icon, end icon and thumb.
slots.description_zh: 开始图标、结束图标和拇指的包装器。

slots.name: thumb
slots.description: The thumb element of the switch. It is the circle element.
slots.description_zh: 开关的 thumb 元素。它是圆形元素。

slots.name: label
slots.description: The label slot of the switch.

slots.name: startContent
slots.description: The icon slot at the start of the switch.
slots.description_zh: 交换机开头的图标插槽。

slots.name: endContent
slots.description: The icon slot at the end of the switch.
slots.description_zh: 交换机末端的图标插槽。

slots.name: thumbIcon
slots.description: The icon slot inside the thumb.
